text: David Ferdinand Durenberger (August 19, 1934 â€“ January 31, 2023) was an American politician. He was born in St. Cloud, Minnesota. He served as a Republican member of the U.S. Senate from Minnesota from November 8, 1978 to January 3, 1995. Durenberger endorsed former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton for the 2016 presidential election. He also supported former Vice President Joe Biden's campaign for the 2020 presidential election. Durenberger died on January 31, 2023 at his home in Saint Paul, Minnesota from heart failure at the age of 88.Former Minnesota Sen. title: David Durenberger
